characters.name: Abaddon The Despoiler
characters.description: Abaddon the Despoiler, Warmaster of Chaos is a character of the Black Legion faction.

activeAbility.name: Drach'nyen
activeAbility.description: Abaddon is set to X Health and immediatley performs a normal melee attack against an adjacent enemy. After this attack and for the rest of the battle, after performing a normal melee attack, Abaddon performs a second attack against an adjacent enemy, dealing 3x Y Piercing Damage.

passiveAbility.name: First Among Traitors
passiveAbility.description: Other friendly Chaos units within 2 hexes deal +X Damage. This value is increased by +Y Damage for each attack Abaddon has performed in this battle, up to a maximum of Z Damage.

rawInfobox.Traits: Let the Galaxy Burn, Resilient, Terminator Armour

characters.name: Abraxas
characters.description: Arkarzar Abraxas, Infernal Master, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Malefic Maelstrom
activeAbility.description: Summon a Pink Horror on a free Hex adjacent to Abraxas. Until the end of this turn, whenever an enemy unit is dealt Psychic Damage, summon a Screamer of Tzeentch on a free Hex adjacent to Abraxas, preferring hexes adjacent to enemy units. Newly summoned units can immediately attack an enemy in range but cannot move. Split (Pink Horror Passive) When this unit gets defeated it summons 2 Blue Horrors in adjacent Hexes. Does not apply if Overkilled. Newly summoned Blue Horrors can immediately attack an enemy in melee if summoned during the enemy's turn, but cannot move until their next turn. Slashing Dive (Screamer Active) Flies over and deals a wave of damage from an initial melee target to targets up to 2 hexes behind. Deals 1x X Power Damage to the first target, 1x Y Power Damage to the second, and 1x Z Power Damage to the third. Lands in the hex directly behind the last target hit, or - in the case that hex is occupied - to the closest free hex to it.

passiveAbility.name: Infernal Pacts
passiveAbility.description: Friendly Chaos units adjacent to Abraxas deal an additional 1x X Psychic Damage with their normal ranged attacks. Affected Daemons also gain the bonus Hit on their normal melee attack.

rawInfobox.Traits: Daemon, Flying, Summon, Weaver of Fates

characters.name: Actus
characters.description: Tech-Priest Manipulus Actus Fulgorosus is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Defend the Divine Work
activeAbility.description: Repairs himself and all friendly adjacent units X Health. Note: Repair only affects Mechanical units.

passiveAbility.name: Galvanic Field
passiveAbility.description: Whenever Actus repairs another unit, that unit immediately attacks a target in range, dealing X% of its own Damage to a maximum of Y Damage per hit. Actus can repair other friendly units even if they are at full Health. Note: Repair only affects Mechanical units.

characters.name: Adamatar
characters.description: Adamatar Xandassus, Mirrorborn, Lord Kakophonist is a character of the Emperor's Children faction.

activeAbility.name: Doom Siren
activeAbility.description: Deals 3x X Direct Damage to an adjacent enemy and up to 2 other random enemies adjacent to the target. For the rest of the battle, Adamatar's normal attacks score an additional Hit for each enemy Overkilled by Doom Siren.

passiveAbility.name: Obsessive Annunciation
passiveAbility.description: All enemy units adjacent to Adamatar take +X Damage from ranged attacks. If an enemy was Overkilled this turn, enemies adjacent to Adamatar take +X Crit Damage from all attacks by friendly Chaos units.

characters.name: Aesoth
characters.description: Aesoth Koumadra, Vexilus Praetor, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Vexilla Magnifica
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Physical Damage to an adjacent enemy target and an additional adjacent enemy unit. Both enemies are Stunned for 1 round, and Aesoth receives -Y% Damage for 1 round. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 2 rounds.

passiveAbility.name: Stand Vigil
passiveAbility.description: Friendly surrounding units have +X Armour and deal +Y% Damage with attacks that are not normal attacks. If a friendly Adeptus Custodes uses an Active Ability, Stand Vigil affects all other friendly units within 2 hexes for 1 round.

characters.name: Aethana
characters.description: Autarch Aethana Barantharal is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Swooping Hawk
activeAbility.description: Flies over and deals a wave of damage from an initial melee target to targets up to two hexes behind. 1x X Piercing Damage to the first target, 1x Y Piercing Damage to the second, and 1x Z Piercing Damage to the third. Lands in the hex directly behind the last target hit, or - in case that hex is occupied - to the closest free hex to it. This ability's damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Path of Command
passiveAbility.description: Other friendly units within 2 hexes gain +X Damage. Their Crit chance - if they have one - is increased by +Y%. Affected Aeldari units gain an additional +Z Damage.

characters.name: Ahriman
characters.description: Ahzek Ahriman, Architect of the Rubric, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Doombolt
activeAbility.description: Deals 3x X Psychic Damage, evenly distributing the hits between all enemies within 2 hexes. Adds +1 Hit for each hex on the battlefield that is currently on Fire. Cannot exceed 9 Hits. When Ahriman defeats an enemy with his normal ranged attack and Doombolt has already been used, then Doombolt can be used again in this battle. Note: Doombolt will recharge each time the condition is met.

passiveAbility.name: Psychic Stalk
passiveAbility.description: Attacks that deal Flame Damage and Psychic Damage to enemies that are on hexes with Fire deal +X% Damage. Affected attacks from friendly Chaos units deal an additional +Y Damage. The hex of each enemy that is hit by Ahriman's normal ranged attack catches Fire. Note: The bonus applies per hit and the Chaos unit bonus is added before the percent bonus is calculated.

characters.name: Aleph-Null
characters.description: Canoptek Spyder Aleph-Null is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Scarab Hive
activeAbility.description: Summons 2 Scarab Swarms next to the target, whom they immediately attack using the Damage type Piercing. In any subsequent attack they use their normal Damage type. Scarab Summon (Active) Summons another Scarab Swarm in a free adjacent hex, which then immediately takes a turn. Reanimation Protocols (Passive) If there is at least one other friendly unit of the same type on the battlefield when this unit is defeated, it has a 35% chance to be immediately revived with 25% of its initial Health in the same hex or a random adjacent one. Does not apply if Overkilled.

passiveAbility.name: Fabricator Claw Array
passiveAbility.description: After moving, repairs one random adjacent friendly Mechanical unit for X Health. If Aleph-Null does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of its turn. Note: Can restore lost members to damaged Scarab Swarms.

rawInfobox.Traits: Flying, Living Metal, Mechanical, Summon, Swarm

characters.name: Ancient Thoread
characters.description: Ancient Cantus Thoread is a character of the Black Templars faction.

activeAbility.name: Unbreakable Duty
activeAbility.description: Ancient Thoread and all friendly units within 2 hexes receive -X% Damage until the start of their next turn. If 2 or more friendly Imperial Characters are dead upon activation of this ability, Ancient Thoread gains Y extra Health and +Z Damage until the end of the battle and immediately performs a normal attack against an adjacent enemy. Note: Characters does not include Summons or NPC units.

passiveAbility.name: Astartes Banner
passiveAbility.description: Other friendly units within 2 hexes score an additional hit with their melee attacks. This additional hit can deal a maximum of X Damage. Note: The bonus hit applies to normal melee attacks and melee abilities.

characters.name: Angrax
characters.description: Terminator Champion Drakfus Angrax is a character of the Black Legion faction.

activeAbility.name: Bringer of Despair
activeAbility.description: Deals 4x X Power Damage to a melee target and 4x X Power Damage to another random enemy adjacent to Angrax. Any resulting Battle Fatigue is triggered twice.

passiveAbility.name: Hateful Assault
passiveAbility.description: Attacks any enemy that moves from a hex adjacent to him, dealing 2x X Power Damage.

rawInfobox.Traits: Deep Strike, Let the Galaxy Burn, Terminator Armour

characters.name: Anuphet
characters.description: Overlord Anuphet is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Resurrection Orb
activeAbility.description: In a free adjacent hex, summons 1 Necron Warrior for each round that has started. Summons 1 more Necron Warrior for each friendly unit with the trait Living Metal that was defeated in this battle. Reanimation Protocols (Passive) If there is at least one other friendly unit of the same type on the battlefield when this unit is defeated, it has a 35% chance to be immediately revived with 25% of its initial Health in the same hex or a random adjacent one. Does not apply if Overkilled.

passiveAbility.name: Martial Apotheosis
passiveAbility.description: At the start of its turn, Anuphet deals 2x X Energy Damage to a random adjacent enemy.

characters.name: Archimatos
characters.description: Master Archimatos is a character of the Black Legion faction.

activeAbility.name: Daemonic Incursion
activeAbility.description: Summons a Bloodletter adjacent to an enemy target within range 2. The Bloodletter immediately attacks the target. Keeps summoning Bloodletters up to a max of 6, as long as the target has not been defeated, is in range and has a free hex adjacent to it. Unstoppable Ferocity (Passive) Has one additional hit when attacking an enemy Psyker in melee, and one more additional hit against an enemy that it has moved into contact with that turn.

passiveAbility.name: Possession
passiveAbility.description: Each time Archimatos kills an enemy unit with melee attack, he summons a Bloodletter in its hex. Each time he kill an enemy unit with a ranged attack, he summons a Blue Horror in its hex.

characters.name: Arjac
characters.description: Arjac Rockfist is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Foehammer
activeAbility.description: Attack target unit within range 2 for 1x X Power Damage and the target is Stunned until the beginning of Arjac's next turn. For each Character that has been defeated in this battle, this ability deals +Y Damage.

passiveAbility.name: Anvil Shield
passiveAbility.description: Arjac blocks an additional X Damage and when he Blocks he covers the attacker's Hex in Ice. If Arjac is below 35% Health, or if his attacker is on a Hex covered in Ice, he gains +Y% Block Chance and if he blocks a melee attack, the attacker is Stunned until the end of the attacker's next turn.

rawInfobox.Traits: Deep Strike, Resilient, Terminator Armour, Unstoppable

characters.name: Asmodai
characters.description: Asmodai, Master of Repentance, is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Exemplar of Hate
activeAbility.description: Select an enemy on the battlefield. For this round and the next, all friendly units deal +X Damage against that enemy with melee or Overwatch attacks. If that enemy is Chaos, it gets Suppressed and Asmodai or another friendly Dark Angel immediately performs a normal attack against the target, dealing Y% of its own damage, to a maximum of Z damage per hit. Note: Healing or Repairing remove the bonus damage effect. (How does Exemplar of Hate work?)

passiveAbility.name: Feared Interrogator
passiveAbility.description: Deals +X Damage against enemies that are Suppressed, Stunned, or that are adjacent to another friendly Dark Angel. Scores +Y hits, if the enemy is also Chaos.

characters.name: Atlacoya
characters.description: Atlacoya, Vigilator, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Talons of the Emperor
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Power Damage to an adjacent enemy unit. This attack deals +Y Damage for each time a friendly Character has used an active ability this battle. If the target is a Psyker or Atlacoya is adjacent to a friendly Adeptus Custodes, this attack deals Direct Damage instead.

passiveAbility.name: Daughter of the Abyss
passiveAbility.description: Atlacoya takes -X Psychic Damage. Psychic Damage dealt to other friendly units within 2 hexes of Atlacoya is reduced by Y%. Enemy Psykers within 2 hexes receive +Z% Damage.

characters.name: Aun'Shi
characters.description: Ethereal Aun'Shi is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Inspired to Greatness
activeAbility.description: Enables a friendly unit in an adjacent Tile to use their Active Ability again in this battle and heals or repairs it for X Health. For this second use, the Ability is at the lowest of its own level and that of Inspired to Greatness. If that unit has not used their active Ability yet, then Y Health is restored instead. (How Does Inspired to Greatness Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Serene Unifier
passiveAbility.description: Aun'Shi grants himself, and adjacent friendly units a bonus based on the current round at the beginning of his turn. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 Hexes also receive this bonus. The bonus lasts until the start of the unit's next turn, even if Aun'Shi is defeated. The following Buffs are granted subsequently in each round. After round 3, the cycle begins again and will continue to repeat until Aun'Shi is defeated.

characters.name: Azkor
characters.description: Azkor, Exalted Eightbound is a character of the World Eaters faction.

activeAbility.name: Overwhelming Wrath
activeAbility.description: Until the beginning of his next turn Azkor Taunts all adjacent enemies and takes -X% Damage from ranged attacks. Deals 2x Y Eviscerating Damage to all adjacent enemies at the beginning of Azkor's next turn.

passiveAbility.name: Beacon of Rage
passiveAbility.description: For each time he was attacked in battle, up to a maximum of 8 times, Azkor deals +X Damage. If Azkor has defeated an enemy in this battle, 50% of the extra damage granted by Beacon of Rage is added to the damage of melee attacks of adjacent friendly Chaos units.

rawInfobox.Traits: Blessings of Khorne, Daemon, Resilient, Terrifying, Unstoppable

characters.name: Azrael
characters.description: Supreme Grandmaster Azrael is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Dark Talon Strike
activeAbility.description: Azrael calls in a Ravenwing Dark Talon to deal 1x X Direct Damage to a target enemy within 2 hexes and 6x Y Bolter Damage to all the enemies in an uninterrupted straight line originating from the initial target. All enemies hit are Suppressed. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Lion Helm
passiveAbility.description: Friendly units within 2 Hexes block an additional X Damage when they Block and deal +Y Damage while firing Overwatch. Other friendly Dark Angels within 2 Hexes also have their Block Chance increased by +Z%.

characters.name: Baraqiel
characters.description: Baraqiel, Deathwing Terminator, is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Plasma Cannon
activeAbility.description: Deals 3x X Plasma Damage to an enemy within range 3 and up to two enemy units behind the target. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 1 round. Initial cooldown: 1 round.

passiveAbility.name: Deathwing
passiveAbility.description: Each time Baraqiel blocks damage during an attack, all further incoming damage is reduced by X and the damage Baraqiel deals with melee or Plasma Cannon attacks is increased by Y for 1 round. This effect is doubled against Chaos enemies or when standing adjacent to another friendly Dark Angel. (HDTW Deathwing)

rawInfobox.Traits: Crushing Strike, Deep Strike, Heavy Weapon, Terminator Armour

characters.name: Bellator
characters.description: Sergeant Bellator is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Death from Above
activeAbility.description: Summons 1 Inceptor for each round that has started. The Inceptors land adjacent to the target, whom they attack immediately. Note: if not enough hexes around the target are free, fewer Inceptors will be summoned.

passiveAbility.name: Shock Assault
passiveAbility.description: Whenever Bellator attacks, any Inceptor adjacent to him also attacks eligible targets, dealing +X Damage for this attack.

characters.name: Boss Gulgortz
characters.description: Boss Gulgortz Bulldoza, Warboss in Mega Armour, is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: WAAAGH!
activeAbility.description: If Boss Gulgortz has not moved, he summons 2 Ork Boyz in free adjacent hexes. Until the end of this turn, all friendly Orks and friendly units adjacent to Boss Gulgortz gain +1 Movement and their normal melee attacks deal +X Damage and score +1 Hit. Boss Gulgortz then charges a targeted enemy in movement range, performing a normal melee attack against it. All friendly Ork Boyz take a turn. Note: Using this ability requires a target within range to charge. Stikkbomb (Active) Throws a grenade at a target, dealing 2x X Blast Damage to the target and 1x X Blast Damage to units in hexes adjacent to the target. Range 2 and Indirect Fire applies.

passiveAbility.name: Light 'Im Up
passiveAbility.description: After performing a Normal Attack, Boss Gulgortz performs a second attack against the same enemy, dealing 3x X Projectile Damage. If the target is defeated, leftover hits are allocated to any random enemy target within 3 hexes.

characters.name: Brother Burchard
characters.description: Brother Raimund Burchard is a character of the Black Templars faction.

activeAbility.name: Fragstorm Grenade Launcher
activeAbility.description: Deals up to 6x X Blast Damage to a target within 2 hexes. Any leftover Hits are allocated to enemy units within 2 hexes, prioritising kills.

passiveAbility.name: Boltstorm
passiveAbility.description: Normal ranged attacks deal an additional 3x X Bolter Damage to the target and to each enemy adjacent to the target that is also within range of Brother Burchard. Enemies hit are Suppressed for 1 round.

rawInfobox.Traits: Crushing Strike, Mk X Gravis, Suppressive Fire

characters.name: Brother Jaeger
characters.description: Brother Kenric Jaeger, the Emperor's Champion is a character of the Black Templars faction.

activeAbility.name: Holy Duel
activeAbility.description: Brother Jaeger Taunts an adjacent enemy unit and immediately performs a normal attack against it. Brother Jaeger deals +X Damage and takes -Y Damage from the target while it's Taunted by him. Brother Jaeger is also Taunted by the target and the taunt does not expire with rounds passed.

passiveAbility.name: Martial Superiority
passiveAbility.description: If Brother Jaeger gets targeted with a melee attack from an adjacent enemy during the enemy's turn, he deals 2x X Power Damage to the attacker before the enemy attack executes.

characters.name: Calandis
characters.description: Ranger Calandis Tawaren is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Fire and Reposition
activeAbility.description: May move as normal and attack. After attacking, she may make one more normal movement. In the following enemy turn, she takes -X Damage from ranged attacks. Can only be used if Calandis has a target in range.

passiveAbility.name: Wireweave Net
passiveAbility.description: The first time Calandis is targeted by a normal melee attack during the enemy's turn, the attacker immediately takes 2x X Piercing Damage. If the attacker is eliminated, their melee attack is not executed.

characters.name: Castellan Creed
characters.description: Lord Castellan Ursarkar E. Creed is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Supreme Commander
activeAbility.description: Summons up to 2 Cadian Guardsmen in free adjacent hexes. All friendly Cadian Guardsmen within 2 hexes then immediately take a turn. If Colour Sergeant Kell is in play, summons an additional Cadian Guardsman and activation range is 3.

passiveAbility.name: Sworn Protector
passiveAbility.description: When Lord Castellan Creed is first targeted in battle, Colour Sergeant Kell appears in a free adjacent hex. Any time Creed is attacked, Kell switches hexes with him and takes the Damage instead, if they are adjacent to each other.

characters.name: Celestine
characters.description: Celestine, the Living Saint is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.

activeAbility.name: Sky Strike
activeAbility.description: If Celestine has not moved, she targets an enemy unit on the battlefield that has a free adjacent hex, then moves adjacent to it and attacks it. The attack deals the same damage as her normal attack plus an additional +X Damage. Initial cooldown: 1 round Note: This is not a normal attack.

passiveAbility.name: Geminae Superia
passiveAbility.description: When attacked, summon a Geminae Superia in a free adjacent hex, and immediately triggers its passive ability Lifewards. Can do this twice per battle. Lifewards (Passive) If Celestine is in an adjacent hex and takes damage, that post-Armour damage is taken as Direct Damage by the Geminae Superia instead.

characters.name: Certus
characters.description: Sergeant Certus is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Mortis Round
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Heavy Round Damage to a single target within range 3, which is then pushed back 1 hex. The Heavy Weapon trait applies double to this ability.

passiveAbility.name: Camo Cloak
passiveAbility.description: Whenever an incoming ranged attack has its number of hits reduced for any reason, it deals -X damage per hit to this unit.

characters.name: Commissar Yarrick
characters.description: Commissar Yarrick is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Send In The Next Wave
activeAbility.description: Select a target within 2 hexes. Summon 2 Cadian Guardsmen plus one for each defeated friendly unit, who immediately appear and fire upon a target from random free hexes within range 2 of the target. The maximum number of Cadian Guardsmen this can summon is X.

passiveAbility.name: Summary Execution
passiveAbility.description: Friendly units with Battle Fatigue gain +X Damage. The first time a friendly unit would flee due to Battle Fatigue, it is executed instead and all other friendly units with the trait ignore it and gain an additional +Y Damage.

characters.name: Corrodius
characters.description: Corrodius Achebile, Noxious Blightbringer is a character of the Death Guard faction.

activeAbility.name: Poxwalkers
activeAbility.description: Summons Poxwalkers in X% of free hexes (rounded up) within Corrodius's Contagion aura. Newly summoned Poxwalkers immediately attack in melee, but cannot move this turn. Cursed of the Walking Pox (Passive) Each time this unit kills an enemy non-Mechanical unit, a Poxwalker is summoned in that hex.

passiveAbility.name: Cursed Plague Bell
passiveAbility.description: Friendly Chaos units starting their turn within Corrodius's Contagion aura gain +1 Movement for this turn. Enemy Psyker units within Corrodius's Contagion aura deal 1x X Psychic Damage to themselves each time one of their attacks deals Psychic damage.

characters.name: Dante
characters.description: Commander Dante, Chapter Master, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Light of Sanguinius
activeAbility.description: If Dante has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn, then charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 5 and deals 5x X Melta Damage to it. The target and enemy units surrounding it deal -Y% Damage for 1 round. This effect is doubled if they attack friendly units that are at or below 50% Health.

passiveAbility.name: Lord of the Host
passiveAbility.description: Other friendly units within 2 hexes with Rapid Assault or Flying deal +X Damage with melee attacks. Affected units that are at or below 50% Health also score +1 hit with melee attacks.

rawInfobox.Traits: Deep Strike, Final Vengeance, Flying, Rapid Assault, Terrifying

characters.name: Darkstrider
characters.description: Shas'el T'au Myamoto, aka Sub-Commander Darkstrider, is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Fighting Retreat
activeAbility.description: Adjacent enemies gain a Markerlight. They also have 1 fewer Hits, to a minimum of one, and deal -X Damage for one round. Darkstrider and adjacent allied units ignore their Close Combat Weakness trait for ranged attacks until the end of this turn. If Darkstrider is adjacent to an enemy, he can immediately take another turn after using this ability.

passiveAbility.name: Structural Analyser
passiveAbility.description: Units hit by ranged attacks from Darkstrider receive a Markerlight for one round. Friendly units adjacent to Darkstrider deal +X Damage with ranged attacks against targets with a Markerlight. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 hexes of Darkstrider are also affected.

rawInfobox.Traits: Close Combat Weakness, Infiltrate, Suppressive Fire

characters.name: Deathleaper
characters.description: Deathleaper, the Vanguard Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Fear of the Unseen
activeAbility.description: If the Deathleaper has not moved this turn and is not in Deep Strike, all enemies within 2 hexes get Suppressed and trigger Battle Fatigue, if they have it. The Deathleaper vanishes and cannot be targeted or damaged for 1 round. In its next turn, its attacks deal an additional 3x X Direct Damage and it can move to any free hex on the battlefield that is either within Synapse range, has Tall Grass or is not adjacent to an enemy.

passiveAbility.name: Feeder Tendrils
passiveAbility.description: When charging, the Deathleaper deals +X Damage, heals for Y Health, and Suppresses the target for 1 round.

characters.name: Eldryon
characters.description: Farseer Eldryon Ynaduin is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Executioner
activeAbility.description: An enemy target within range 2 takes X Psychic Damage for each round that has started. If the target is eliminated, then an adjacent enemy unit also takes X Psychic Damage for each round that has started.

passiveAbility.name: Doom
passiveAbility.description: All enemy units exactly 2 hexes away from Eldryon take +X Damage from other friendly unit's normal attacks. Other friendly Aeldari units deal +Y Damage with all their attacks to affected units instead. Note: The additional damage is applied per hit and it works against units with Immune. Aeldari abilities (except Aethana's active) do gain the bonus damage.

characters.name: Exitor-Rho
characters.description: Exitor-Rho-1.15/X, Sicarian Ruststalker Princeps, is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Chordclaw
activeAbility.description: Deals 4x X Direct Damage to an adjacent enemy. All of Exitor-Rho's further attacks until the end of its next turn deal additional 2x Y Direct Damage.

passiveAbility.name: Optimised Gait
passiveAbility.description: Whenever an enemy adjacent to Exitor-Rho is attacked by another friendly Mechanical unit, deal 2x X Energy Damage to that enemy. If an enemy adjacent to Exitor-Rho is defeated by a friendly Mechanical unit or an attack triggered from this ability, Exitor-Rho moves onto its hex.

characters.name: Forcas
characters.description: Forcas Oathsworn, Inner Circle Companion, is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Calibanite Greatsword
activeAbility.description: Forcas can switch between two stances. This ability can be used once per turn; each use switches the active Stance and does not end Forcass turn. Only the first use of this ability in each battle counts for missions.

passiveAbility.name: Enmity for the Unworthy
passiveAbility.description: Forcas deals +X% Damage for each adjacent unit and additional +Y Damage for each adjacent friendly Dark Angel.

characters.name: Gibbascrapz
characters.description: Gibbascrapz, Big Mek, is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: Grot Tank
activeAbility.description: Calls in a Grot Tank in an adjacent free hex. The Grot Tank cannot move on its first turn, but can immediately attack an enemy in range. The Grot Tank has +X Health for each round that has started. Ramshackle (Passive) Takes -X Damage from attacks with Damage Types that have 30% Pierce Ratio or lower.

passiveAbility.name: Kustom Force Field
passiveAbility.description: All friendly adjacent units have an additional +X Armour.

characters.name: Haarken Worldclaimer
characters.description: Haarken Worldclaimer, Herald of the Apocalypse is a character of the Black Legion faction.

activeAbility.name: Herald of the Apocalypse
activeAbility.description: Deals 2x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy and an additional enemy directly behind the target. Affected enemies receive +Y Damage from the next attack against them. Also triggers Battle Fatigue for all enemy units within 2 hexes of the original target.

passiveAbility.name: Head-Claimer
passiveAbility.description: For each enemy unit that Haarken has defeated, his attacks deal +X Damage for the rest of the battle. For each enemy Character that he has defeated, his attacks also score +1 Hit for the rest of the battle.

rawInfobox.Traits: Flying, Let the Galaxy Burn, Terrifying

characters.name: High Marshal Helbrecht
characters.description: High Marshal Helbrecht is a character of the Black Templars faction.

activeAbility.name: Crusade of Wrath
activeAbility.description: All friendly units within 2 hexes gain +X Damage and +Y% pierce ratio in melee - regardless of Damage type - for this round and the next. High Marshal Helbrecht immediately performs a normal melee attack against a random adjacent enemy.

passiveAbility.name: Destroy The Witch
passiveAbility.description: Gains +1 Movement when there's an enemy Psyker on the battlefield. This unit and friendly adjacent units deal +X Damage with melee attacks against Psykers.

characters.name: Hollan
characters.description: Hollan Baumgart, Biophagus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Aberrant Hypermorph
activeAbility.description: Summons an Aberrant Hypermorph in a free adjacent hex. The Aberrant Hypermorph can immediately attack, but cannot move this turn. Hypermorph (Passive) Gain extra Damage equal to 15% of current Health.

passiveAbility.name: Twisted Science
passiveAbility.description: Units Healed by Hollan, other than himself, are affected by Twisted Science until they are defeated. Hollan can heal other unaffected units even if they are at full Health. Affected units immediately gain X Health and their maximum Health increases by the same amount. If they are a Genestealer Cults unit, they also deal +Y Damage while affected. Affected units cannot gain the effects of Twisted Science again.

characters.name: Imospekh
characters.description: Hexmark Destroyer Imospekh is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Multi-Threat Eliminator
activeAbility.description: Deals 6x X Molecular Damage to an enemy within range 2. Any leftover hits are allocated to another enemy adjacent to the target and in range 2. Each enemy killed adds +1 hit and the ability keeps targeting new enemies until there are no more enemies or hits left.

passiveAbility.name: Inescapable Death
passiveAbility.description: Imospekh's ranged attacks each deal +X damage per hit when triggered by Overwatch. When defeating a unit with an attack triggered by Overwatch, Imospekh stays in Overwatch, retaining 1 fewer hits compared to the previous attack.

characters.name: Incisus
characters.description: Apothecary Andreas Incisus is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Combat Restoratives
activeAbility.description: Heals himself and all adjacent friendly units by X Health, Y Health if Imperial.

passiveAbility.name: Narthecium
passiveAbility.description: When an adjacent friendly non-Mechanical unit is defeated, it is immediately revived with X Health, unless Overkilled. Can only be triggered once per turn.

characters.name: Isaak
characters.description: Isaak Starn, Primus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Cult Demagogue
activeAbility.description: Targets an enemy unit within 2 hexes and places Decoys on up to Y random free hexes within 2 hexes around the target. Then summons Neophyte Hybrids on half of all the friendly Decoys in that area and all Neophyte Hybrids in that area immediately take a turn.

passiveAbility.name: Decoys and Misdirection
passiveAbility.description: When an enemy moves onto a friendly Decoy, it takes 1x X Blast Damage. When a friendly unit resurrects onto or moves onto a friendly Decoy, it deals +Y Damage until the end of its turn, and if it is a Genestealer Cults unit, it also places a new Decoy in a free adjacent hex.

characters.name: Isabella
characters.description: Isabella Mariken is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.

activeAbility.name: Rites of Restoration
activeAbility.description: Heals herself and all adjacent friendly units for X Health. Resurrects 1 random friendly Imperial Character and up to 2 random friendly Imperial Summons that have been defeated in this battle. Resurrected units appear in free adjacent hexes with Y Health and are unable to act on this turn. Only affects non-Mechanical units.

passiveAbility.name: Medicus Ministorum
passiveAbility.description: Any friendly adjacent non-Mechanical unit that takes damage Regenerates X Health afterwards, unless it is defeated. Note: Medicus Ministorum triggers once per attack, not per hit.

characters.name: Jain Zar
characters.description: Jain Zar, Howling Banshee Phoenix Lord, is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Silent Death
activeAbility.description: Jain Zar throws the Silent Death at an adjacent enemy, dealing 3x X Piercing Damage to it and up to 3 additional enemies adjacent to each other, before returning to Jain Zar's hands.

passiveAbility.name: Terror's Lament
passiveAbility.description: Adjacent enemy units deal -X Damage and have -1 Hits with melee attacks, to a minimum of 1.

characters.name: Judh
characters.description: Judh Lhaska, Kelermorph, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Heroic Fusillade
activeAbility.description: Targets an enemy unit that has a free surrounding hex within movement range 2 of Judh or is already on a hex surrounding Judh. She then moves to the free hex and deals 6x X Projectile Damage to the target and all other enemies surrounding it. Crits deal an additional +Y Crit Damage for each free hex surrounding the targeted enemy. When Judh is resurrected and Heroic Fusillade has already been used, then it can be used again in this battle.

passiveAbility.name: Hypersensory Abilities
passiveAbility.description: The first time each enemy turn that Judh is attacked, she cannot fall below X% of her current Health. After the attack, she moves to a free adjacent hex and places a Decoy on the hex she moved from. Then, if she is within 2 hexes of the unit that attacked her, she deals 3x Y Projectile Damage to that unit.

characters.name: Kariyan
characters.description: Kariyan Helsates, Blade Champion, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Martial Inspiration
activeAbility.description: Deals 3x X Eviscerating Damage to an adjacent enemy. This attack and attacks from Legacy of Combat this turn deal +Y% Damage for each turn in which Kariyan performed an attack this battle. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 2 rounds.

passiveAbility.name: Legacy of Combat
passiveAbility.description: After performing his first attack each turn, Kariyan performs an additional attack. If he is adjacent to an enemy Big Target, this attack deals 1x X Piercing Damage to it. If there is no adjacent enemy Big Target, Kariyan deals 3x Y Power Damage to each adjacent enemy instead.

rawInfobox.Traits: Beast Slayer, Martial Ka'tah, Parry, Rapid Assault, Resilient

characters.name: Kharn
characters.description: Khrn, the Betrayer, Champion of Khorne, is a character of the World Eaters faction.

activeAbility.name: Kill! Maim! Burn!
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy. Then performs a second attack targeting an adjacent enemy, dealing 6x Y Eviscerating Damage. Then performs a third attack targeting an enemy within range 2, dealing 1x Z Plasma Damage. All attacks prioritize the same target until it is killed and then prioritize kills.

passiveAbility.name: The Betrayer
passiveAbility.description: After performing a normal attack, Khrn performs a second attack targeting an adjacent enemy, dealing 4x X Eviscerating Damage. If Khrn has defeated an enemy this battle, at the start of his turn, he automatically moves up to 2 hexes towards the nearest unit and then deals 4x X Eviscerating Damage to an adjacent unit. Khrn prefers enemies for this automatic move and attack, but targets friendly units if no enemy is in range.

rawInfobox.Traits: Blessings of Khorne, Final Vengeance, Rapid Assault

characters.name: Kut Skoden
characters.description: Kut Skoden is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Frag Bomb
activeAbility.description: Deals 6x X Blast Damage to an adjacent target and 3x X Blast Damage to ALL units adjacent to the target hex, except Kut Skoden himself.

passiveAbility.name: Avalanche of Muscle
passiveAbility.description: Deals +X Damage when charging.

characters.name: Lucien
characters.description: Lucien, Death Company Intercessor, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Black Rage
activeAbility.description: If Lucien has not moved, he is set to X% Health. He then immediately charges a targeted enemy in movement range and performs a normal melee attack against it. For this attack and until the end of the battle, Lucien has +1 Movement and deals +Y Damage when Charging. Additionally, Lucien can no longer be controlled for the rest of the battle, and moves and attacks automatically at the beginning of his turn instead.

passiveAbility.name: Visions of Heresy
passiveAbility.description: After performing a normal attack, Lucien performs a second attack targeting an enemy within range 2, dealing 2x X Bolter Damage. If Lucien is at or below 50% Health, all of his attacks have +Y% pierce ratio.

characters.name: Lucius
characters.description: Lucius the Eternal, Champion of Slaanesh, is a character of the Emperor's Children faction.

activeAbility.name: Lash of Torment
activeAbility.description: Deals 6x X Eviscerating Damage to an enemy unit within range 2. If the target is not already adjacent to Lucius, it is then pulled 1 hex towards him if possible, and can be pulled over any elevation but not through impassable terrain. If the target is adjacent to Lucius after the attack, it is also Taunted by him for 1 round(s).

passiveAbility.name: Armour of Shrieking Souls
passiveAbility.description: If Lucius is defeated by an enemy unit, that enemy becomes Elated. At the beginning of each of its turns, the affected unit loses X Health and when it is defeated, Lucius resurrects on the hex it was defeated on with Y Health. Note: Healing/Repairing does not remove Elated. The health loss cannot be increased or reduced by any modifiers.

characters.name: Macer
characters.description: Macer Bloodgrin, the Jakhal Dishonoured, is a character of the World Eaters faction.

activeAbility.name: Jakhal Stimms
activeAbility.description: Deals 4x X Physical Damage to an adjacent enemy and all other enemies adjacent to both Macer and the target. Macer loses 25% of his current Health and is then able to immediately attack again.

passiveAbility.name: Skullsmasher
passiveAbility.description: Macer deals +X Damage for each 10% of his maximum Health he is currently missing. In addition, if Macer has defeated an enemy this battle, all enemies he attacks become Stunned.

characters.name: Makhotep
characters.description: Royal Warden Makhotep is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Adaptive Strategy
activeAbility.description: Triggers Relentless March again for all adjacent Non-Character friendly units and makes them immediately take an action, dealing X Damage per hit if they attack.

passiveAbility.name: Relentless March
passiveAbility.description: Gives +1 Movement to all friendly units that start their turn in an adjacent hex. Also repairs affected Mechanical units for X Health.

characters.name: Maladus
characters.description: Blightlord Champion Maladus 'Solos' Phlegmore is a character of the Death Guard faction.

activeAbility.name: Flail Swing
activeAbility.description: Performs a melee attack dealing 3x X Power Damage to the target and triggering Haze of Corruption if the target is defeated. Any unit defeated by this attack or its add-on attacks from Haze of Corruption is always Overkilled.

passiveAbility.name: Haze of Corruption
passiveAbility.description: Anytime Maladus Phlegmore defeats its target, any leftover Damage and an additional 1x X Toxic Damage is dealt to a random enemy unit adjacent to both Maladus Phlegmore and the initial target. If this unit is also defeated, an additional unit adjacent to both Maladus Phlegmore and its initial target is also hit.

rawInfobox.Traits: Contagions of Nurgle, Resilient, Terminator Armour

characters.name: Marneus Calgar
characters.description: Marneus Calgar is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Gauntlets of Ultramar
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Bolter Damage to all enemies within 2 hexes. Scores an additional +1 hit against surrounding enemies.

passiveAbility.name: Rites of Battle
passiveAbility.description: Adjacent friendly units gain +X Damage. Imperial units gain +Y Damage instead.

characters.name: Marshal Dreir
characters.description: Lord Marshal Varnan Dreir is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Leading the Charge
activeAbility.description: If Dreir has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn and charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 4, dealing 3x X Power Damage to it. Then, summon up to Y Death Riders in free adjacent hexes that can immediately attack enemies in range. All attacks triggered by this ability have +Z% Pierce Ratio for each friendly unit that has been defeated this battle. Frag Lance (Passive) When Charging, normal melee attacks deal an additional 1x X Blast Damage.

passiveAbility.name: Tough to Kill
passiveAbility.description: At the beginning of his turn, Dreir regenerates X Health. All attacks against Dreir have -Y% Crit Chance and deal -Z Crit Damage.

characters.name: Mataneo
characters.description: Mataneo, Jump Pack Intercessor Sergeant, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Hammer of Wrath
activeAbility.description: If Mataneo has not moved, he gains Infiltrate until the end of this turn, charges an enemy target that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 5, dealing 2x X Power Damage to the target and 1x X Physical Damage to all enemies adjacent to it. If Mataneo is at or below 50% Health, double the damage dealt by this ability. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit. Note: The damage doubling is pre-Armour.

passiveAbility.name: Aggressive Onslaught
passiveAbility.description: When charging, Mataneo summons 2 Jump Pack Intercessors adjacent to and immediately attacking his target. At the beginning of each of Mataneo's turns, if he is still on the battlefield, all Jump Pack Intercessors summoned this way leave the battlefield. Red Thirst (Passive) If this unit is at or below 50% Health, it gains +X Damage and scores +1 hit when charging.

characters.name: Maugan Ra
characters.description: Maugan Ra, Dark Reaper Phoenix Lord, is a character of the Aeldari faction.

activeAbility.name: Harvester of Souls
activeAbility.description: Deals 2x X Heavy Round Damage to a target within range 3 and to all enemies adjacent to the target that are also within range 3 of Maugan Ra. These attacks score an additional hit if Maugan Ra has not moved this turn.

passiveAbility.name: Inescapable Accuracy
passiveAbility.description: If Maugan Ra has not moved then his ranged attacks ignore hit reductions from both hex effects and unit effects, and they also have +X% Crit Chance and deal an additional Y Crit Damage. Inescapable Accuracy applies to targets of Maugetar as well as attacks triggered by Overwatch.

characters.name: Mephiston
characters.description: Mephiston, Lord of Death, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: The Quickening
activeAbility.description: Targets a hex within movement range 2 that is neither occupied by an enemy nor by a friendly unit in Deep Strike. Mephiston moves onto that hex. If a friendly unit is on that hex, that unit moves to Mephiston's previous location. All Blood Angels moving this way perform a normal melee attack after they move, dealing X% of their of their own damage to a maximum of Y Damage. Units moving this way do not trigger Overwatch or other movement related reactions. (How does The Quickening work?)

passiveAbility.name: Fury of the Ancients
passiveAbility.description: After moving, deals 2x X Psychic Damage to an adjacent enemy and an additional enemy adjacent to the initial one. For 2 rounds, affected units cannot be revived, healed, repaired, nor otherwise restore Health. If Mephiston does not move, this ability triggers at the end of his turn. (Note: Death replacement effects like Incisus's or Nauseous Rotbone's Passives are Revives. Effects like Isabella's active are Resurrections.)

characters.name: Morvenn Vahl
characters.description: Morvenn Vahl is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.

activeAbility.name: Sanctorum Missile
activeAbility.description: Deals 2x X Blast Damage to a target within 3 hexes and 1x X Blast Damage to all hexes adjacent to the target - with the exception of Morvenn Vahl's own hex, were she adjacent to the target. Range 3. Note: This ability functions as "within range 3", so cannot target units at range if an enemy is adjacent.

passiveAbility.name: Righteous Repugnance
passiveAbility.description: Normal melee attacks deal an additional 3x X Power Damage to the target and to all enemy units adjacent to both the target and to Morvenn Vahl. When Morvenn Vahl defeats a unit with a melee attack, it has a Y% chance to count twice for Act of Faith.

rawInfobox.Traits: Act of Faith, Big Target, Explodes, Mechanical

characters.name: Nauseous Rotbone
characters.description: Plague Surgeon Nauseous Rotbone is a character of the Death Guard faction.

activeAbility.name: Revitalising Malignancy
activeAbility.description: Heals himself and all adjacent friendly units X Health, +X Health if Chaos. No effect if Imperial.

passiveAbility.name: Tainted Narthecium
passiveAbility.description: An adjacent friendly Chaos unit that takes lethal damage has a 75% chance to be revived with X Health, even if Overkilled. Can only be triggered once per turn.

characters.name: Neurothrope
characters.description: Neurothrope, the Psychic Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Spirit Leech
activeAbility.description: Deal 1x X Psychic Damage to an enemy unit within 3 Hexes. If the target is Suppressed, deals an additional +Y Damage, otherwise Suppresses it. The Neurothrope heals itself and friendly Tyranids adjacent to it for Health equal to Z% of the total damage dealt with this ability. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit. Note: Even though this ability ignores attacker bonuses, it does benefit from stacks of Neuroparasite.

passiveAbility.name: Neuroparasite
passiveAbility.description: Each enemy that is dealt Psychic Damage by the Neurothrope is infected by a Neuroparasite until either the unit is healed or the Neurothrope is defeated. Whenever a unit infected with a Neuroparasite takes Psychic Damage or becomes affected by an attack or ability that would Suppress it, the level of the Neuroparasite increases by 1, up to a maximum of X. Psychic Damage dealt by the Neurothrope is increased by Y Damage for each level of a Neuroparasite on the target.

rawInfobox.Traits: Close Combat Weakness, Flying, Psyker, Shadow in the Warp, Synapse

characters.name: Nicodemus
characters.description: Nicodemus, Sanguinary Priest, is a character of the Blood Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Blood Chalice
activeAbility.description: All adjacent friendly non-Mechanical units are set to 50% Health. Until the start of their next turn, affected units gain +X% pierce ratio with melee attacks and heal for Y Health if they perform a melee attack.

passiveAbility.name: Sanguinary Priest
passiveAbility.description: After moving, all adjacent friendly non-Mechanical units Regenerate X Health. If Nicodemus does not move, this ability triggers at the end of his turn.

characters.name: Njal
characters.description: Njal Stormcaller, Lord of Runes, is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Stormcaller
activeAbility.description: Target an enemy within 3 hexes. The target's hex and all adjacent hexes get covered in Ice. All enemy units standing on hexes covered in Ice take 3x X Psychic Damage. Flying enemies damaged this way get Stunned for 1 round. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Lord of Tempests
passiveAbility.description: Njal's normal attacks deal +X Damage for each hex surrounding him that is covered in Ice. The hex of each enemy that is hit by Njal's normal attacks is covered in Ice at the end of the attack.

characters.name: Parasite of Mortrex
characters.description: Parasite of Mortrex, the Invader Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: It Itches!
activeAbility.description: Suppresses and pushes an adjacent enemy unit and all enemy units adjacent to both the target and the Parasite of Mortrex one hex backwards. Enemy steppables on affected hexes are destroyed. Then summons a Ripper Swarm in each hex vacated by this ability. The Ripper Swarms can immediately attack. If the Parasite of Mortrex is within Synapse range, it may move again after activating this ability. Burrowers (Active) This unit may burrow in its turn, disappearing from the battlefield. In its following turn it must surface and may do so in any free hex. If adjacent to an enemy unit, it may attack in melee immediately.

passiveAbility.name: Barbed Ovipositor
passiveAbility.description: When the Parasite of Mortrex defeats a unit it targeted that is not Mechanical it summons a Ripper Swarm in the defeated unit's hex.

rawInfobox.Traits: Battle Fatigue, Instinctive Behaviour, Summon, Swarm

characters.name: Pestillian
characters.description: Pestillian Witherpus, Biologus Putrifier is a character of the Death Guard faction.

activeAbility.name: Foul Infusion
activeAbility.description: Pestillian and all friendly Chaos units within his Contagion aura deal an extra 1x X Toxic Damage with their normal melee attacks for this round and the next. Pestillian then immediately performs a normal melee attack against a random adjacent enemy.

passiveAbility.name: Explosive Maladies
passiveAbility.description: Friendly units adjacent to Pestillian deal an additional 1x X Blast Damage with their normal ranged attacks. Friendly Chaos units adjacent to Pestillian also deal this damage with normal melee attacks. Enemies defeated by affected attacks are always Overkilled.

rawInfobox.Traits: Contagions of Nurgle, Putrid Explosion, Resilient

characters.name: Ragnar
characters.description: Ragnar Blackmane, Wolf Lord of the Blackmanes, is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: War Howl
activeAbility.description: If Ragnar has not moved, he and all friendly Characters that don't have a normal ranged attack gain Unstoppable until the end of this turn. Additionally, their normal melee attacks have +X% Crit Chance and deal +Y Damage until the end of this turn. After using War Howl, Ragnar can move and perform a normal attack.

passiveAbility.name: Saga of the Warrior Born
passiveAbility.description: When charging, Ragnar scores X additional Hits and his critical hits deal an additional +Y Crit Damage. If Ragnar has defeated one or more enemy Characters this battle, friendly Space Wolves also gain this ability. Note: Friendly Space Wolves only gain the first part of the ability (the additional Hits and Crit Damage). They do not gain the second part of the ability to give the ability to friendly Space Wolves again.

rawInfobox.Traits: Beast Slayer, Final Vengeance, Rapid Assault

characters.name: Re'vas
characters.description: Shas'vre Vior'la Re'vas is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Early Warning Override
activeAbility.description: Summons 2 Shield Drones into free adjacent hexes. Newly summoned Shield Drones can immediately attack an enemy in melee, but cannot move this turn. Re'vas also starts Overwatching until the start of her next turn, ignoring the Close Combat Weakness trait and dealing +X Damage. When defeating a unit while Overwatching, she remains in Overwatch, retaining 1 fewer Hits compared to the previous attack. Savior Protocols (Passive) If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead. When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it. When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

passiveAbility.name: Cyclic Ion Blaster
passiveAbility.description: All attacks deal an additional 3x X Particle Damage. If the target has a Markerlight or the Mechanical trait these hits deal +Y Damage.

characters.name: Roswitha
characters.description: Roswitha Esther is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.

activeAbility.name: Brazier of Holy Fire
activeAbility.description: Deals 2x X Flame Damage to a target enemy within range 2 and sets its hex on Fire. Deals 4x X Flame Damage vs Daemons instead. ALL Daemons within 2 hexes of the target take +Y% Extra Damage this round and the next. Immune Daemons only take +Z% Extra Damage. Note: Healing or Repairing remove the bonus damage effect.

passiveAbility.name: Condemnor Stake
passiveAbility.description: Deals +X Damage against Psykers.

characters.name: Sarquael
characters.description: Hellblaster Sergeant Sarquael is a character of the Dark Angels faction.

activeAbility.name: Supercharge
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Plasma Damage to a target enemy within range 3 and 1x Y Plasma Damage to up to two enemies in adjacent hexes behind the target, all with +Z% pierce ratio. Until the beginning of Sarquael's next turn, any further hits that deal Plasma Damage against these units also have +Z% pierce ratio. Note: +35% Pierce Ratio comes at level 50

passiveAbility.name: Grim Retribution
passiveAbility.description: During each enemy turn, if there is no enemy adjacent to Sarquael, he shoots back at the first enemy within range that attacked him or a friendly adjacent Dark Angel. This shot counts as Overwatch and deals 1x X Plasma Damage.

characters.name: Shadowsun
characters.description: Shas'O T'au Shaserra, aka Shadowsun, aka Supreme Commander of the T'au Empire, is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Exemplar of the Kauyon
activeAbility.description: Commander Shadowsun disappears, then reappears on a target Hex adjacent to an allied unit and immediately performs a normal attack against the closest enemy target. This attack deals an additional 2x X Blast Damage. A stationary Command-Link Drone is summoned in the hex she previously occupied. Initial cooldown: 1 round Savior Protocols (Passive) If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead. When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it. When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

passiveAbility.name: Defender of the Greater Good
passiveAbility.description: Friendly units adjacent to Shadowsun or her Command-Link Drone deal +X Damage with ranged attacks, except attacks that deal Psychic Damage. Affected attacks also have a chance to score an additional hit. This chance is 25% for each round in which Shadowsun has been on the battlefield. Friendly Tau Empire units within 2 hexes of Shadowsun or her Command-Link Drone are also affected by this ability.

characters.name: Shiron
characters.description: Shiron Capersi the Idolator, Noise Marine, is a character of the Emperor's Children faction.

activeAbility.name: Excrutiating Frequencies
activeAbility.description: Affects 3 hexes in a straight line in one of 6 directions. This attack has +X% Crit Chance for each unit on affected hexes and deals 1x X Blast Damage to each enemy on affected hexes. Enemies hit are also Suppressed.

passiveAbility.name: Terrifying Crescendo
passiveAbility.description: Shiron's ranged attacks deal +X Damage for each time he Overkilled or would have Suppressed an enemy unit, up to a maximum of 6 times.

rawInfobox.Traits: Heavy Weapon, Suppressive Fire, Thrill Seekers

characters.name: Sho'syl
characters.description: Shas'ui Vior'la Sho'syl is a character of the Tau Empire faction.

activeAbility.name: Seeker Missile Frequency Lock
activeAbility.description: A target enemy unit within 5 hexes receives a Markerlight until the end of Sho'syl's next turn. At the beginning of Sho'syl's next turn, if he is still in play, the target is hit by a Seeker Missile dealing 1x X Heavy Round Damage. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: MV71 Sniper Drone Squad
passiveAbility.description: Instead of a ranged attack, Sho'syl summons a MV71 Sniper Drone and commands it to attack the target. This attack uses Sho'syl's Damage stat, while other effects, like buffs, are taken from the Drone. If Sho'syl already controls 3 MV71 Sniper Drones, the one with the lowest Health is removed before the new Drone is summoned. The target also gains a Markerlight until the end of Sho'syl's next turn. Savior Protocols (Passive) If a friendly adjacent Tau Empire Character is hit by an attack, there is a 50% chance that this Drone takes the hit instead. When moving, this Drone tries to prioritize hexes adjacent to friendly Tau Empire Characters, especially the character who summomned it. When attacking, this Drone tries to prioritize enemies with a Markerlight.

rawInfobox.Traits: Close Combat Weakness, Flying, Mechanical, Summon

characters.name: Sibyll Devine
characters.description: Sibyll Devine is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Psychic Maelstrom
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Psychic Damage to a target within 2 hexes. 75% chance to score another hit. If it does, 50% chance to score another hit. If it does, 25% chance to score another hit. If it does, 10% chance to score another hit. Note: This attack only damages a single target. It does not chain to additional targets. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Nightshroud
passiveAbility.description: All friendly units starting their turn adjacent to Sibyll Devine gain Infiltrate for that turn and take -X damage from each hit in their and the next enemy turn.

characters.name: Snappawrecka
characters.description: Snappawrecka, Killa Kan is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: DAKKA! DAKKA! DAKKA!
activeAbility.description: Deals 6x X Projectile Damage to an enemy within range 3. Adds +2 hits for each time Snappawrecka was repaired this battle, but cannot exceed 16 hits in total. If the target is defeated, leftover hits are allocated to random enemies within 3 hexes. Snappawrecka also loses 15% of his maximum Health.

passiveAbility.name: Power Trip
passiveAbility.description: Normal attacks ignore X Armour. If Snappawrecka is at full Health, his normal attacks additionally score +1 hit and reduce the target's Armour by X Armour, but also cause Snappawrecka to lose 5% of his maximum Health.

rawInfobox.Traits: Big Target, Explodes, Get Stuck In, Mechanical

characters.name: Snotflogga
characters.description: Grumbal Snotflogga, Runtherder is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: Get'em Runtz
activeAbility.description: Summons 1 Grot in each adjacent hex that also has an enemy unit adjacent to it. Newly spawned Grots can immediately attack an enemy in melee, but cannot move this turn. Enemy units attacked by a Grot this way are Taunted for 1 round. Pile In (Passive) If this unit has full Health at the end of its turn, it has a 75% chance to spawn another Grot in an adjacent free hex, -5% for each friendly Grot currently on the board. The spawned Grot acts as normal on its next turn.

passiveAbility.name: Squig Hound
passiveAbility.description: Friendly Grots ignore Battle Fatigue. Each time Snotflogga attacks, the Squig Hound also bites the target, dealing an additional 2x X Physical Damage. Then, if there are less than 5 friendly Grots on the battlefield, summon a Grot adjacent to the target that immediately can attack.

characters.name: Sword Brother Godswyl
characters.description: Sword Brother Fedreus Godswyl is a character of the Black Templars faction.

activeAbility.name: Thunderous Assault
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Power Damage and pushes the enemy one hex backwards. The target is Stunned for 1 round. Sword Brother Godswyl then moves into the vacated hex if able. Enemies defeated by this attack are always Overkilled.

passiveAbility.name: Champion of the Feast
passiveAbility.description: After moving, deals 1x X Power Damage to an adjacent enemy and reduces this enemy's Armour by Y Armour for the rest of the battle. If Sword Brother Godswyl does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of his turn.

characters.name: Sy-Gex
characters.description: Sy-Gex-KPH008/15.MK41, Kataphron Destroyer, is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Sentinel Directives
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Physical Damage to an enemy unit within range 3 and Suppresses it for 1 round. Cannot be used if there is an enemy adjacent to Sy-Gex. After using Sentinel Directives, Sy-Gex can perform a normal attack or enter Overwatch.

passiveAbility.name: Heavy Grav-Cannon
passiveAbility.description: Ranged attacks against Mk X Gravis, Terminator Armour, or Mechanical units deal +X Damage and have +Y% pierce ratio.

characters.name: Tan Gi'da
characters.description: Tan Gi'da, Skitarii Marshal, is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Doctrina Imperatives
activeAbility.description: Tan Gi'da switches between two Imperatives that affect him and all friendly adjacent Mechanical units: This ability can be used once per turn instead of once per battle; each use switches the active Imperative. Tan Gi'da can attack after using this ability. Only the first use of this ability each battle counts for missions.

passiveAbility.name: Control Edict
passiveAbility.description: While Protector Imperative is active: After Tan Gi'da attacks, summon a Skitarii Vanguard in a free adjacent hex. Cannot have more than X Skitarii Vanguards summoned this way at the same time. While Conqueror Imperative is active: After Tan Gi'da attacks, all friendly adjacent Mechanical Summons also immediately attack his target if it is within range. Rad-Saturation (Passive) After the Skitarii Vanguard moves, it adds Contamination to its hex. If it does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of its turn.

characters.name: Tanksmasha
characters.description: Olog Tanksmasha, Nob on a Smasha Squig, is a character of the Orks faction.

activeAbility.name: Unstoppable Momentum
activeAbility.description: Charges in one of 6 directions and keeps moving in a straight line until he hits an obstacle or a Big Target. Any enemies hit by the charge take 1x X Direct Damage, increased by Y Damage for each hex traversed from the starting hex to the enemy. Affected enemies get pushed and Suppressed for 1 round. A Big Target is Stunned for 1 round instead. Friendly units are also displaced, but take no damage or negative effects. Initial cooldown: 1 round (How Does Tanksmasha Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Smasha 'Ead
passiveAbility.description: When he traverses 2 or more hexes during his turn, then Tanksmasha gains +X Damage for normal attacks and takes -Y% Damage until the start of his next turn.

rawInfobox.Traits: Beast Slayer, Get Stuck In, Unstoppable

characters.name: Tarvakh
characters.description: Tarvakh, the Headsman, Master of Executions is a character of the World Eaters faction.

activeAbility.name: Murderous Swing
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Piercing Damage to all adjacent enemies. If this attack only hits one enemy, it deals +Y damage

passiveAbility.name: Trophy Taker
passiveAbility.description: Tarvakh's attacks against units that are at or below 50% of their maximum Health deal +X Damage and additional +X Crit Damage. His Crit Chance is increased by Y% for each unit that he defeated this battle.

characters.name: Thaddeus Noble
characters.description: Thaddeus 'Stevens' Noble is a character of the Astra Militarum faction.

activeAbility.name: Basilisk Barrage
activeAbility.description: If Thaddeus Noble has not moved, unleashes a barrage of 5 shells on any target on the battlefield, each dealing 2x X Blast Damage. 3 randomly hit the target hex or surrounding hexes and the remaining 2 hit the hexes surrounding those. For each round that has ended, 1 more of the shells hits the target hex, starting with the shells hitting the outer hexes. The Suppressive Fire trait also applies to this ability. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit. (How does Basilisk Barrage work?)

passiveAbility.name: Spotter
passiveAbility.description: Friendly units within 2 hexes with the trait Heavy Weapon gain +X Damage.

characters.name: Thaumachus
characters.description: Kairatar Thaumachus, Exalted Sorcerer, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Attempted Possession
activeAbility.description: Target an enemy within 2 hexes. The target and any Summons it has summoned become possessed and immediately perform a normal attack against the closest enemy unit, preferring unpossessed targets. Possessed units deal X% of their own Damage to a maximum of Y Damage per hit. Possessed Summons will move before attacking. (How does Attempted Possession Work?)

passiveAbility.name: Arcane Shield
passiveAbility.description: After moving, Thaumachus applies a Shield to the closest friendly unit within 2 hexes, preferring Thousand Sons units, then other Chaos units, then other friendly units, and lastly casting it on himself if there is no other valid target. The shield has X Health and lasts one round. If Thaumachus does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of his turn.

characters.name: The Patermine
characters.description: The Patermine, Genestealer Patriarch, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Might From Below
activeAbility.description: Deals 5x X Psychic Damage to an adjacent enemy, then summons a Purestrain Genestealer on each Decoy adjacent to the Patermine. The Purestrain Genestealers can immediately attack in melee, but cannot move this turn. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Cosmic Horror
passiveAbility.description: Whenever the Patermine defeats an enemy, it places a Decoy on the hex of that enemy. Other enemies surrounding the defeated unit have a X% chance to be Suppressed for 1 round, and have a X% chance to trigger Battle Fatigue a second time, if they have it. When the Patermine moves onto a decoy, it heals itself for Y Health.

characters.name: Thutmose
characters.description: Plasmancer Thutmose is a character of the Necrons faction.

activeAbility.name: Harbinger of Destruction
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Direct Damage to a target and up to two other random enemies within 2 hexes. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Living Lightning
passiveAbility.description: After moving, deals 1x X Direct Damage to one random adjacent enemy. If Thutmose does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of his turn. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

characters.name: Titus
characters.description: Lieutenant Demetrian Titus is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Tactical Precision
activeAbility.description: Attacks a targeted adjacent enemy. If Titus has charged that enemy this turn, he deal 1x X Bolter Damage to it. This attack is always a Crit and deals an additional +Y Crit Damage. If Titus did not charge the targeted enemy this turn, he instead deals 3x Z Chain Damage to all adjacent enemies. When Titus gets revived or resurrected and Tactical Precision has already been used, then Tactical Precision can be use again in battle.

passiveAbility.name: Fuelled by Fury
passiveAbility.description: Deals +X Damage with all attacks for each time a friendly Character has used an active ability this battle. The first time each turn that Titus is defeated he cannot be Overkilled. The first time each turn he defeats an enemy with an attack triggered by Final Vengeance he is immediately revived with Y Health.

characters.name: Tjark
characters.description: Tjark Wyrdslayer is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Grapnel Launcher
activeAbility.description: Targets an enemy unit within 3 Hexes and deals 1x X Physical Damage to it. If Tjark is not already adjacent to the target, it is then pulled 1 hex towards Tjark if possible, and can be pulled over any elevation but not through impassable terrain. Tjark then moves to occupy the hex the target originally occupied if it's free, or a free adjacent hex if it is not. If there are no free hexes, then Tjark does not move.

passiveAbility.name: Hunters Beyond Death
passiveAbility.description: Deals +X Damage against Psykers, and Enemy Psykers within 2 Hexes deal -X Damage. Unless they are Immune, Enemy Psykers within 2 Hexes will not hit an additional unit with their normal ranged attacks.

characters.name: Toth
characters.description: Sokar Toth, Scarab Occult Terminator, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Hellfyre Missile Rack
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Heavy Round Damage to a target enemy unit within range 3 and an additional 1x X Heavy Round Damage to each enemy unit on the map that was dealt Psychic Damage this turn, which can include the initial target again. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Time Flux
passiveAbility.description: At the beginning of his turn, Toth regenerates X Health plus an additional amount equal to the Damage of the last hit he received in the last enemy turn. The total amount restored cannot exceed Y Health. When Toth moves, he leaves a time ghost behind on the hex he moved from. The time ghost vanishes if the hex becomes occupied by another unit or if the terrain becomes impassable (as with Broken Ice). The first time Toth dies each battle, if his time ghost is on the battlefield then he revives with Z Health remaining at its location. This works even if Toth is Overkilled.

rawInfobox.Traits: Suppressive Fire, Terminator Armour, Weaver of Fates

characters.name: Trajann
characters.description: Trajann Valoris, Captain-General, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Moment Shackle
activeAbility.description: Trajann heals himself for W Health. For 1 round, Trajann has +X% Block Chance and blocks an additional Y Damage. During that round, he also deals 2x Z Bolter Damage to each enemy unit that moves from a hex adjacent to him.

passiveAbility.name: Legendary Commander
passiveAbility.description: Enemies receive +X Damage if they are adjacent to any friendly unit that has used an active ability this turn. If the affected enemies are also adjacent to Trajann, friendly Characters score Y additional hits against them with their first attack that is not a normal attack.

characters.name: Typhus
characters.description: Typhus, Herald of the Plague God is a character of the Death Guard faction.

activeAbility.name: Plague Wind
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Psychic Damage to a target within 2 hexes. Any enemies adjacent to the initial target take 1x Y Psychic Damage. Any further enemies adjacent to at least one secondary target take 1x Z Psychic Damage. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Destroyer Hive
passiveAbility.description: Deals 1x X Direct Damage to one random adjacent enemy at the start of his turn.

rawInfobox.Traits: Contagions of Nurgle, Psyker, Resilient, Terminator Armour

characters.name: Tyrant Guard
characters.description: Tyrant Guard, the Guardian Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Crushing Claws
activeAbility.description: Deals 2x X Piercing Damage to an adjacent enemy and Taunts them for 1 round. Enemies adjacent to both the Tyrant Guard and the target are dealt 1x X Physical Damage and then get pushed back 1 Hex. All affected units become Suppressed for 1 round.

passiveAbility.name: Guardian Organism
passiveAbility.description: If the Tyrant Guard is within Synapse range or did not move during its previous turn, it and friendly units affected by its Big Target trait take -X% Damage during the enemy's next turn, up to a maximum of -Y Damage per hit. Note: The percent damage reduction occurs pre-Armour.

characters.name: Tyrith
characters.description: Tyrith Shiva Kyrus, Custodian Guard, is a character of the Adeptus Custodes faction.

activeAbility.name: Vigilance Eternal
activeAbility.description: Targets an enemy unit that has a free adjacent hex within movement range 2 of Tyrith or is already on a hex adjacent to Tyrith. She then moves to the free hex and deals 3x X Power Damage to the targeted unit. This ability can be used multiple times per battle but has a cooldown of 2 rounds. Using Vigilance Eternal does not end Tyrith's turn.

passiveAbility.name: Unwavering Sentinel
passiveAbility.description: During each enemy turn, after Tyrith is attacked and the attacker is within range 2, she deals 2x X Bolter Damage to the attacker. If there is an enemy adjacent to Tyrith, the range of this ability is reduced to 1.

characters.name: Ulf
characters.description: Ulf Frosthowl is a character of the Space Wolves faction.

activeAbility.name: Great Frost Axe
activeAbility.description: Attack an enemy unit in melee for 4x X Piercing Damage and cover the hex the enemy stands on and all hexes adjacent to it in Ice. The Crit Damage bonus of the Ice is already applied for this attack.

passiveAbility.name: Savage Killer
passiveAbility.description: When a Summon moves to or is summoned adjacent to Ulf, he immediately deals 5x X Power Damage to it. Ulf will also perform this ability against any enemy that attempts to use an active ability while in a Hex adjacent to him, in which case he deals his Damage before that unit's ability is activated.

characters.name: Varro Tigurius
characters.description: Varro Tigurius is a character of the Ultramarines faction.

activeAbility.name: Storm of Wrath
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Psychic Damage to a unit within 2 hexes and up to Y adjacent units. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Psychic Fortress
passiveAbility.description: All friendly surrounding units have an added Block with 50% chance to block X damage. Also reduces incoming Psychic Damage by Y.

characters.name: Vindicta
characters.description: Battle Sister Vindicta is a character of the Adepta Sororitas faction.

activeAbility.name: Armorium Cherub
activeAbility.description: Deals 4x X Flame Damage to a target within range 2 and is then able to immediately attack again.

passiveAbility.name: Fire of Absolution
passiveAbility.description: When performing a ranged attack, also deals 3x X Flame Damage to all units adjacent to the target. Has a 30% chance of setting each adjacent hex on Fire as well.

characters.name: Vitruvius
characters.description: Magos Dominus Vitruvius Thannek is a character of the Adeptus Mechanicus faction.

activeAbility.name: Rad-Bombardment
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Toxic Damage to all units in a straight line in one of 6 directions and adds Contamination to all hexes in the line. All units hits are Suppressed. The length of the line starts at 2 hexes and increases by 1 hex for each round that has passed and by 1 hex each time a friendly Mechanic restores Health of a unit. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Master Annihilator
passiveAbility.description: When Vitruvius performs a Normal Attack against an enemy, that enemy is affected by Master Annihilator until Vitruvius is defeated of performs a normal attack against a different unit. Attacks by any friendly unit against the affected enemy score an additional hit, except attacks that deal Psychic Damage. This additional hit can deal a maximum of X Damage.

characters.name: Volk
characters.description: Volk, Reforged by the Warp is a character of the Black Legion faction.

activeAbility.name: Frenzied Firing
activeAbility.description: Deals 6x X Heavy Round Damage, with hits evenly distributed between all enemies within range 3. Each unit hit gets Suppressed. This ability's Damage ignores all of the attacker bonuses and modifiers (including elevation), and cannot Crit.

passiveAbility.name: Fleshmetal Guns
passiveAbility.description: Volk has a 30% chance of adding +X Heavy Round Damage and +20% Pierce ratio to all hits when performing a ranged attack. Does not apply to hits from Frenzied Firing.

rawInfobox.Traits: Big Target, Daemon, Let the Galaxy Burn, Suppressive Fire

characters.name: Winged Prime
characters.description: Winged Prime, the Lead Warrior Organism, is a character of the Tyranids faction.

activeAbility.name: Alpha Warrior
activeAbility.description: If the Winged Prime has not moved this turn, summons a Tyranid Warrior on a free hex within Synapse range. The Tyranid Warrior cannot move this turn, but can immediately perform a normal attack against an enemy in range. Scything Talons (Active) Attacks an enemy in melee for 3x X Bio Damage and any enemy units adjacent to that target and to the Prime take 2x X Bio Damage. Double hits against Summons. Reinforced Hive Node (Passive) Every second round - starting from the first the Prime is in play - the Prime has +100% Armour and - if it has Block - 100% Block Chance.

passiveAbility.name: Synaptic Lynchpin
passiveAbility.description: Whenever the Winged Prime, or another friendly unit with Synapse, performs a normal attack against an enemy and that enemy is not defeated, summon a Hormagaunt adjacent to the target, which immediately attacks the enemy. Cannot have more than X Hormagaunts summoned this way at the same time. Adrenal Glands (Passive) May move with +1 Movement if that move ends in a hex adjacent to an enemy. Hungering Swarm (Passive) Whenever this unit performs a melee attack, it deals +1 Hit for any friendly Hormagaunt or Ripper Swarm adjacent to the target.

characters.name: Wrask
characters.description: Wrask, the Butcher, is a character of the World Eaters faction.

activeAbility.name: Bloody Fury
activeAbility.description: Deals 1x X Chain Damage to an adjacent enemy. This attack scores +1 Hit for each time Wrask was attacked in this battle, to a maximum of 8 hits total. Any leftover hits are allocated to remaining adjacent enemies, prioritising kills.

passiveAbility.name: Wrathful Devotion
passiveAbility.description: When Wrask arrives from Deep Strike or defeats an enemy in melee, he and adjacent friendly Chaos units gain a Shield with X Health for 1 round.

rawInfobox.Traits: Blessings of Khorne, Deep Strike, Rapid Assault, Terminator Armour, Unstoppable

characters.name: Xybia
characters.description: Xybia Kheiser, Magus, is a character of the Genestealer Cults faction.

activeAbility.name: Mind Control
activeAbility.description: Targets an enemy unit within 3 hexes that is adjacent to one or more friendly units. For this round and the next, that enemy unit deals -X Damage, takes +Y% Damage, and becomes Taunted by the adjacent unit with the highest current Health. Note: The adjacent unit with the highest current Health is chosen from among the friendly units. Healing or Repairing remove the bonus damage effect.

passiveAbility.name: Decoy
passiveAbility.description: After moving, places a Decoy on an empty adjacent hex. Then, if there are 2 or more decoys adjacent to Xybia, summons a Neophyte Hybrid on one adjacent decoy. If Xybia does not move, then this ability triggers at the end of her turn.

characters.name: Yazaghor
characters.description: Yazaghor Ficklefate, Tzaangor Enlightened, is a character of the Thousand Sons faction.

activeAbility.name: Sorcerous Facade
activeAbility.description: Target a friendly Psyker. Until the beginning of Yazaghor's next turn both he and the target deal an additional 1x X Psychic Damage with their normal attacks. Yazaghor performs a normal attack against the closest enemy unit, and then switches positions with the targeted Psyker. Note: this ability can only be used if Yazaghor has an enemy in range.

passiveAbility.name: Reality Unbound
passiveAbility.description: For each different enemy unit that was dealt Psychic Damage this turn Yazaghor deals +X Maximum Damage with his normal ranged attacks. If three or more different enemy units have been dealt Psychic Damage this turn he gains +1 Movement and his normal ranged attack gets +1 Range until the end of this turn. Note: Bonus Maximum Damage extends the high end of the 20% variance range. See this How Does That Work article for more information.
